channel.title: MineCraft/Runescape HD Texture pack
channel.description:
Here is what I have so far, I am going to take a break on modeling to train my 2d art skills a little more (Still going to add this onto a 3d mesh, That is why its here).
Things I am going to fix up is some of the shadows and the side stiches.
100% made in photoshop btw, If I need to I will bake a normal map in blender to give it more of a cloth feel.
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/Fun_Project.jpg[/img]

item.title: MineCraft/Runescape HD Texture pack
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

amy_webb:

Is the darker part on the neck ment to be muscles? If so they look a bit off, isn’t the collar bone ment to go under the short? Good start though, looking forward to seeing more of it.

Ah yeah, Did all of that by hand. No special effects from photoshop, And did it without a reference image. After some more parts are done, I will go back to that part to fix it up a little.

Read full topic
